New Records: Oklahoma City Thunder set a franchise-record 15th straight win
Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 points and 11 rebounds
Thunder held Boston to a season-low 27 points in the second half
Lu Dort made all three of his shots from beyond the arc in the fourth quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thunder improved to 30-5, have not lost a game that counted in the standings since Dec. 1
The previous team record was set by the then-Seattle SuperSonics in 1996
Others: Jayson Tatum had 26 points and 10 rebounds for the defending NBA champion Celtics
Jaylen Brown scored 21 points, but went scoreless on 0-for-7 shooting in the second half
